lnk Class Reference

This class is the link between qocc and my cam- and gcode-related code. It was originally named 'link' but that caused compilation problems in qoccharnesswindow. More...

 lnk (QoccHarnessWindow *w)

Detailed Description

This class is the link between qocc and my cam- and gcode-related code. It was originally named 'link' but that caused compilation problems in qoccharnesswindow.

Author:
Mark Pictor
